data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 3, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Santa Clara.
Free kick Porto.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 7, Luis Diaz (Porto) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Porto have a goal kick.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
In the minute 9, Porto have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Porto to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
In the minute 9, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 11, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio de Sao Miguel, Santa Clara are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a throw-in for Porto, close to Santa Clara's area.
Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 20, Joao Pinheiro signals a Porto throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Porto in the half of Santa Clara.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Porto.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Porto in the half of Santa Clara.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto just outside Santa Clara's area.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 33, Santa Clara's Osama Rashid has been booked in Ponta Delgada.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
In the minute 36, Marko Grujic (Porto) has received a yellow card from Joao Pinheiro.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 38, Costinha is booked for the home team.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In the minute 42, The match at Estadio de Sao Miguel has been interrupted briefly for a check on Otavio, who is down injured.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Joao Pinheiro awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In the minute 44, In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Porto.
In the minute 45, Joao Pinheiro will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Joao Pinheiro blows to end the first-half.
Goal! Porto have got their heads in front thanks to a Luis Diaz strike.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Wilson Manafa.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Porto.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Porto's half.
Portoâ€™s Otavio is on his feet again at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Porto throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in Porto.
In the minute 52, Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 58, Joao Pinheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Porto to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 59, Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Santa Clara advance rapidly upfield but Joao Pinheiro blows for offside.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
Mateus Uribe is replacing Marko Grujic for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 65, Moussa Marega is on a sub for Mehdi Taremi for Porto.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Sao Miguel with Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis replacing Salomao.
The home team have replaced Costinha with Lincoln. This is the second substitution made today by Daniel Ramos.
In the minute 67, Santa Clara are caught offside.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Porto.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Joao Pinheiro awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Porto.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Free kick Santa Clara.
In the minute 81, Daniel Ramos (Santa Clara) is making a third substitution, with Ukra replacing Osama Rashid.
Free kick Porto.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
Sergio Conceicao is making the team's third substitution at Estadio de Sao Miguel with Fabio Vieira replacing Jesus Corona.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
Can Santa Clara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Porto's half?
In the minute 88, Sergio Conceicao (Porto) is making a fourth substitution, with Joao Mario replacing Luis Diaz.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Porto's half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
Joao Pinheiro blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
The away team replace Sergio Oliveira with Diogo Leite.
